title: S. Cruz
description: The Roman Villa of Baños de Valdearados, also known as the Villa de Santa Cruz, is located in Baños de Valdearados, Burgos region of Ribera del Duero, in Castilla y León (Spain). A Late Imperial Roman villa (fourth and fifth centuries CE) with polychrome mosaics is located at the site.
names: Villa romana de Banos de Valdearados

properties.title: OSM location of Villa Romana de Santa Cruz
